title: New featured game mode idea: Yordle Kombat
body:
It's exactly what it sounds like: Players may only pick yordles. For this game mode, any number of players may pick the same champion to make up for the relatively _**small**_ champion pool.

Maybe we get a new custom map for it or something.

replies.body: {{champion:74}} Choose your density... I mean... your destiny...
shroom garden will be no longer just a dream.

>
> shroom garden will be no longer just a dream.

more mushroom juice for me

Jokes on you, I pretty much only play yordles as it is

i like it :D bout to spam teemo with my friends
I vouch for this, all I want in return is for the yordles to be removed from the actual game :)
